telegram.title: Follow the official channel on Telegram

cardTitle: International Level Diploma: Our graduates receive diplomas recognized in Uzbekistan and Europe.
Qualified Professors: Selected professors from local and European universities teach our students.
Overseas Study Programs: The university provides students with opportunities to participate in study programs organized in Finland.
Double Degree: Nordik University offers double and joint degree programs in collaboration with Karelia University of Applied Sciences, Finland.
Work & Travel: The university enables students to work in Europe during summer breaks to earn tuition fees.

doctorate.main_title:
Indicators of postgraduate education
activities at the university
doctorate.description: According to license № 156360 issued on November 6, 2023, by the Ministry of Higher Education, Science, and Innovation of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Nordic International University is authorized to operate in postgraduate education institutions in 6 specializations.
doctorate.center_title:
State of admission of doctoral students
and independent researchers
by years
doctorate.bottom_title: Admission processes are carried out in accordance with the Presidential Decree № PF-4958 of February 16, 2017, "On measures to improve the system of postgraduate education" and the Resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan № 304 of May 22, 2017, "On measures to improve the system of postgraduate education" through the Unified Electronic System for Coordination of Postgraduate Education (daraja ilmiy uz).

eJournal.button: Visit this site to submit articles!
eJournal.description:
Scientific and practical e-journal "Nordic" The International Nordik University has received the right to publish the scientific and practical e-journal "Nordic" based on Certificate No. 057211 of the Agency of Information and Mass Communications under the Presidential Administration of the Republic of Uzbekistan. Articles are published in Uzbek, Russian, English, and Finnish languages.

The Nordic scientific and practical e-journal operates with the ISSN-3030-3400 international standard.
eJournal.davr:
Journal frequency: 5 issues per year

Founder: International Nordik University

Publication date: 15th of every second month.
eJournal.body: The primary goal of the journal is to publish and disseminate scientific research and results conducted by professors, master's degree students, and undergraduates.

tasimo_olympiad.farmon: Olympiad Decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated September 11, 2023 on the strategy "Uzbekistan - 2030" No. PD-158 and the Decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated May 7, 2020 "On measures to improve the quality of education in the field of mathematics and develop scientific research" It was established in order to ensure the implementation of the tasks specified in the decision PR-4708
tasimo_olympiad.description: This Olympiad is conducted among students of general secondary schools, academic lyceums, and vocational schools in three stages: regional selection, republican, and international levels.

faq.text: In this section dedicated to frequently asked questions about the International Nordic University, prospective students can find concise and clear information on the admission process, required documents, benefits, academic programs, and other essential details.

admission_process.description: The team of the International Nordik University, imbued with boundless curiosity and a passion for learning, values analytical thinking, innovation, problem-solving, and openness to new ideas.
admission_process.body: Encouraging, supportive, and joyful, the International Nordik University becomes a second home for many students.

table.cefr: CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Languages)
table.description_bold: The team of the International Nordik University, imbued with boundless curiosity and a passion for learning, values analytical thinking, innovation, problem-solving, and openness to new ideas.
table.body: The International Nordik University becomes a second home for many students, providing support, encouragement, and joy.

overview.title: Faculties, Departments, and Offices
overview.description: The International Nordik University offers Bachelor's (full-time, part-time, and special part-time), Master's, Doctorate programs, 6 departments, and 8 offices.
overview.demand: All our fields of study are in high demand in various sectors.

levels.name: Bachelor
levels.description: You have the opportunity to study in one of 19 educational directions, participate in joint programs, and obtain a diploma from two countries. In the summer, you can participate in a contract-based "work and travel" program.

levels.name: Master's
levels.description: Complete one of 13 educational programs and obtain a master's degree. International practical programs and qualified professors will help you become a specialist.

levels.name: Doctorate
levels.description: After higher education, there is the opportunity to pursue a doctorate (PhD and DSc) in 6 directions and engage in independent research.

certificate.description: MASTER'S and POSTGRADUATE EDUCATION require national or internationally recognized foreign language proficiency certificates.

Work_and_travel.description:
The "Work and Travel" program of the International Nordik University allows you to combine education and work.

By studying and working in advanced countries like Finland, our students can gain practical experience and enhance their professional skills.

Moreover, this program offers the opportunity to explore different parts of Europe.

The "Work and Travel" program not only aids in career development but also broadens the worldview of our students.
Work_and_travel.body: We are ready to assist you in enriching your educational and work experience.

exam.exam_room_equipment: Our exams are conducted in state-of-the-art computer rooms equipped with the latest technology.
exam.student_computer_rooms: With nearly 400 modern computers, our exam rooms provide a continuous and comfortable environment.
exam.fair_exam_process: To ensure a fair and transparent exam process, qualified proctors and special task groups have been formed.
exam.hemis_platform: All exams are conducted through the HEMIS platform, enabling our students to receive results quickly and accurately.
exam.university_commitment: The International Nordik University strives to ensure the efficiency and fairness of exams to accurately evaluate the knowledge and skills of students.
exam.future_success_focus: Our exam process is aimed at laying the foundation for the future success of students.
exam.exam_process_organization: The International Nordik University pays special attention to the high level of organization of the exam process.
